page.title: 18A Day at school
page.content: On Monday in the morning we come in and do our spellings.Then we go out and line up for swimming.While we are waiting for the coach we usually talk.When we get to RNAS Culdrose sports centre we take the swimming floats and hoops.We go in groups in the pool. When we are back in school we get the tables out ready for dinner.After dinner we do some english.Then after playtime we either do needlework or literature.At playtime we play 40-40. This is played by as many people as you like.One person is it and the others hide.He counts up to 40 and then goes to look for the people who are hiding.If he sees one he runs back to the post and says 40-40 out and their name.If the person who is hiding gets to the post before the person who is it he is in.
